verses.roman:
rāya kahe,--īhāra āge puche hena jane
eta-dina nāhi jāni, āchaye bhuvane

synonyms: rāya kahe—Rāmānanda Rāya replied; ihāra āge—beyond this point; puche—inquires; hena—such; jane—a person; eta-dina—until this day; nāhi jāni—I did not know; āchaye—there is; bhuvane—within this material world.
translation: Rāya Rāmānanda replied, "Until this day I did not know anyone within this material world who could inquire beyond this perfectional stage of devotional service.
